title: StaticExport entities ignore --update flag
description:
Analysis: All StaticExport entities have updatedAt fields BUT their GraphQL queries don't include filter parameters.

StaticExport entities missing filter param:
- teams, users, initiatives, cycles, issue_labels, workflow_states, project_milestones

Working Export entities with filter param:
- issues (IssueFilter), comments (CommentFilter), projects (ProjectFilter), documents (DocumentFilter), attachments (AttachmentFilter)

Fix requires:
1. Check if Linear API supports filtering on these endpoints (TeamFilter, UserFilter, etc.)
2. Add filter param to queries that support it
3. Change StaticExport to Export for those entities

title: Investigate redownloads happening with --update
description: User reports files being re-downloaded even with --update flag. Need to verify if latest.json fix resolves it, or if there's a manifest/URL matching issue.
close_reason: Verified - manifest correctly prevents re-downloads. Ran export 3 times, manifest stayed at 10 entries with no duplicates.

title: Version tests hardcode '0.0.0' instead of reading actual version
Check Linear API filter support for static entities
description: Need to verify which endpoints support filtering: teams, users, initiatives, cycles, issueLabels, workflowStates, projectMilestones. Check Linear GraphQL schema or docs.
